news.title: Innovative Superconducting Thin Nanomaterial Gets Magnets Levitating

news.title: Ultrathin superconducting film developed
news.summary: Oliver Dietze What looks like a pretty unremarkable piece of burnt paper is in fact an ultrathin superconductor that has been developed by the team lead by Uwe Hartmann (r.) shown here with doctoral student XianLin Zeng.
